comment.author: 51809917@N00
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Pith Helmets, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 45699166@N00
comment._content:
Oh wow they had Canon 1Ds mkIII's in 1882?! Hehe I guess you are using this to speed up the scanning workflow, good idea. The results are very nice, I am sure you are busy but I would be very interested to see a snap of your capture setup and a bit of info about lighting, exposure etc. if you don't mind sharing and have the time of course. 

Keep up the good work =)
